pullrequest.title: Add gpu rays class for lidar simulation

content.raw: yeah using materials helped. It took a while but I found that the reason the 1st pass was not run is because that `this->dataPtr->ogreCamera` is not set up properly. Since we’re not creating this camera using the OgreCamera class, I just had to port some of the code to make sure after we create the camera with its rotation, clip dist, FOVs, aspect ratio set to the correct values.
